apex-commerce.title: Apex Commerce
apex-commerce.description: A high-performance headless ecommerce platform built for a luxury fashion brand, handling 50k+ daily visitors with sub-second page loads.
apex-commerce.overview: Apex Commerce is a fully custom headless ecommerce solution designed for a luxury fashion retailer looking to scale their online presence internationally. The platform supports multi-currency, multi-language, and region-specific catalogs with a seamless checkout experience.
apex-commerce.challenge: The existing monolithic platform was struggling under traffic spikes during seasonal launches, with page load times exceeding 8 seconds and a cart abandonment rate of 78%. The client needed a modern solution that could handle global traffic while maintaining the premium brand experience their customers expected.
apex-commerce.solution: We architected a headless commerce stack with Next.js on the frontend and a custom API layer backed by a composable commerce engine. Static generation for product pages combined with ISR for inventory-sensitive data gave us the best of both worlds — blazing speed with real-time accuracy. A custom CDN strategy ensured sub-200ms TTFB globally.

neural-dashboard.title: Neural Dashboard
neural-dashboard.description: An AI-powered analytics dashboard that transforms raw business data into actionable insights with natural language queries and predictive modeling.
neural-dashboard.overview: Neural Dashboard is an enterprise analytics platform that makes complex data accessible to non-technical teams. Users can query their business data using plain English, generate automated reports, and receive AI-driven recommendations for operational improvements.
neural-dashboard.challenge: The client, a mid-size logistics company, was drowning in data but starving for insights. Their analysts spent 80% of their time writing SQL queries and building manual reports, leaving little room for actual strategic analysis. They needed a tool that could democratize data access across the organization.
neural-dashboard.solution: We built a custom NLP layer that translates natural language queries into optimized database operations, backed by a fine-tuned LLM for context-aware interpretation. A real-time streaming pipeline ensures dashboards stay current, while a predictive engine surfaces anomalies and trends before they become problems.
neural-dashboard.result0: Report generation time reduced from 4 hours to 30 seconds
neural-dashboard.result1: 95% query accuracy on natural language inputs
neural-dashboard.result2: Adopted by 200+ non-technical employees in first quarter

flow-crm.title: Flow CRM
flow-crm.description: A custom CRM system with intelligent automation that reduced the sales team pipeline management time by 60% and increased close rates.
flow-crm.overview: Flow CRM is a purpose-built customer relationship management system designed for a SaaS company with a complex B2B sales cycle. Unlike off-the-shelf solutions, every feature was tailored to their specific workflow, from lead scoring to contract management.
flow-crm.challenge: The sales team was using a combination of spreadsheets, a legacy CRM, and email threads to manage a pipeline of 2,000+ active deals. Critical follow-ups were being missed, lead scoring was manual and inconsistent, and management had zero visibility into pipeline health without hours of manual consolidation.
flow-crm.solution: We designed a CRM from the ground up around their sales methodology, with automated lead scoring based on engagement signals, intelligent follow-up scheduling, and a real-time pipeline dashboard. Deep integrations with their email, calendar, and billing systems eliminated double-entry and created a single source of truth.
flow-crm.result2: Zero missed follow-ups in first 6 months
flow-crm.result3: Full pipeline visibility for leadership in real-time
